pages.text: A much more powerful chunk of coal mixed with $(l:innovation/materials/hellfire_dust)hellfire dust$() in a $(l:innovation/burn/cauldron)cauldron$().$(br2)An essential ingredient in the crafting of a $(l:exploration/tools/glaretorch)glaretorch$() and a powerful Soulforged Steel pickaxe.$(br2)In my testing, this substance burns for twice as long as a normal piece of coal!
